subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steve Flesch shot a seven-under-par 65 yesterday to take sole possession of the lead after two rounds of the inaugural Turning Stone Resort Championship in Verona, N.Y. He was at 13-under 131 and one stroke ahead of the first-round co-leader Jeff Gove (67) and Brendon de Jonge, who had a second consecutive 66. Charles Warren (65) was alone in fourth, another shot back.
